extendedInfo.description: ZoeMob Family Locator is the must have app for families. Install it and receive alerts automatically if your kids arrive at school or home, if they are over the speed limit in the school bus and if they are sending or receiving bullying and sexting messages.ZoeMob Family Locator is the most accurate service in the world, used by over 4.5 million families worldwide!â FULL LOCATION TRACKINGAll location and movement information of your kids remain recorded in your ZoeMob account and they are shown on the map. You can monitor it by computer or mobile device.â GEOFENCING ALERTS and PROXIMITY ALERTSReceive alerts when your kids arrive at school or at home. Or even if they are nearby or far away from a place you have determined in the map (itÂ´s like a automatic checkin!).â OVER SPEED ALERTSReceive alerts if your kids are in a car over the speed limit that you consider safe. This way, you can monitor if their school bus is moving at the correct speed.â SMS CONTENT ALERTS (bullying and sexting)Receive alerts if your kids are receiving or sending any SMS messages with inappropriate content like bullying and sexting. You define the terms witch must be monitored.ZoeMob is the best family safety service for parents who wish to ensure their children and family members are protected and safe all day long. We use best GPS tracking technology for keeping your kids safe.â ZOEMOB FAMILY LOCATOR FEATURES (for 1 device)* Can monitor 1 (ONE) device full for 7 daysYou can change the device after installation and track it from your computer. Go to our Customer Services at http://support.zoemob.com to get the instructions.* Full location tracking for 7 days* Geofencing alerts and proximity alerts for 7 days* Over Ospeed alerts for 7 days* SMS content alerts for 7 days (anti bullying and anti sexting)* SMS history for 7 days (full sent/received messages)* Call history for 7 days (view the incoming/outgoing call log)* Callbacks for 7 days (hear everything around the monitored device)* Remote wipe for 7 days (delete deviceâs data remotely)* UNLIMITED Family Messenger (private group chat)* UNLIMITED Panic buttonNote: All new FREE accounts are elegible for a 7 days trial of Premium Version for 1 (ONE) device as describe above. After that, you can keep using the FREE version or upgrade to PREMIUM version to enhance your family protection.â USER'S COMMENTS"Peace of mind for me and my family. Now I can tracking and monitoring my kids anytime. Congratulations!"  Greg Higins."This is the best gps tracking app!Thank you, I donât worry anymore where my kids are. Just fantastic. Thanks guys". Maki"Your app is greatIt works great with my friends that have android phones. I used the app with my family while on vacation and it worked flawlessly.". ZillowDon't waste time. Use your Android device as a GPS tracker and get the location of your family members today. ZoeMob Family Locator is the more realiable family gps tracker in the world.â ZOEMOB FAMILY LOCATOR PREMIUM FEATURES* UP TO 5 (FIVE) DEVICES in the same account* UNLIMITED geofencing and proximity alerts* UNLIMITED over speed alerts* UNLIMITED SMS alerts (anti bullying and anti sexting) * UNLIMITED Location tracking* UNLIMITED computer access* UNLIMITED mobile access* UNLIMITED call history* UNLIMITED SMS history* UNLIMITED Callbacks* UNLIMITED remote wipe* No advertising* Priority Support* Plus all free features and new features that will be announced soon.* Price: so cheap as a Big Mac!â HAVE QUESTIONS ABOUT ZOEMOB FAMILY LOCATOR?Please don't hesitate to CONTACT US at http://support.zoemob.comZoeMob - Your Family Safety Service

reviews.title: Was good until update
reviews.comment: The app updated this morning and now isn\'t worth the money. It was great but now after having to sign in again on both devices, the monitoted device shows an expired free trial (I am paying) and on the administrator device it is showing the monitored device\'s messages 3 times. Very irritating.
reviews.author: Brynn Mcgrew

reviews.title: Total scam
reviews.comment: Says free bit is a 7 days trial only. Tried to log in and was told my trial has expired after 2 seconds.
reviews.author: Thomas Schneider

reviews.title: Garbage!!
reviews.comment: complete waste of space. couldnt log in to my acct. I reported them to google play and they cancelled my acct AFTER they charged my debit card again!! This app is junk. I cant uninstall the app off my phone!! Want this crap off Now!!
reviews.author: Heather Skinner

reviews.title: A waste!
reviews.comment: I cannot unsubsribe to this app and they keep charging me! I sent a request asking them to unsubsribe and they told me that they can\'t do it and that I have to unsubscribe through google play. There isn\'t anything in my google play apps that says i have a subscription to anything, so how I am I supposed to unsubcribe?? Are they just going to keep charging me no matter how many times I ask for a cancellation?? I find it funny that they have an entire website dedicated to this app but the only ONE thing that is NOT available is unsubscribing! They just want your money and make it impossible to get rid of their app. Total scam artists. I see that I am going to have to report them, too!
reviews.author: Lyn Galiot

reviews.title: No puedo ver historial en el servidor de ZoeMob
